( (CTR_EEPN_MNTH12_BFR + END_EEPN_MNTH12_BFR + CTR_EEPN_MNTH13_AFT + END_EEPN_MNTH13_AFT) + ( CASE WHEN NVL(CTR_RKFCD_DT,'N') = 'N' THEN 0 ELSE ( CASE WHEN (TO_DATE(END_RKFCD_DT,'YYYYMMDD') - TO_DATE( CTR_RSGTN_DT,'YYYYMMDD')) <= 3 THEN 0 ELSE ( TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(CTR_RSGTN_DT,'YYYYMMDD') + 1, TO_DATE( END_RKFCD_DT ,'YYYYMMDD') - 1),0) + ( CASE WHEN (TO_CHAR((TO_DATE(END_RKFCD_DT,'YYYYMMDD') - 1),'DD') - TO_CHAR((TO_DATE( CTR_RSGTN_DT ,'YYYYMMDD') + 1),'DD')) >= 0 THEN 1 ELSE 1 END ) ) END ) END )) AS CLUT_EEPN_MNTH_ICM , (CTR_ADD_MNTH12_BFR + END_ADD_MNTH12_BFR + CTR_ADD_MNTH13_AFT + END_ADD_MNTH13_AFT) AS CLUT_ADD_MNTH_ICM, ( CASE WHEN NVL(CTR_RSGTN_DT,'N') = 'N' THEN 0 ELSE CASE WHEN (TO_DATE(CTR_RSGTN_DT,'YYYYMMDD') - greatest(TO_DATE(CTR_RKFCD_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),TO_DATE(END_RKFCD_DT,'YYYYMMDD'))) < 1 THEN 0 ELSE TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(greatest(TO_DATE(CTR_RKFCD_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),TO_DATE(END_RKFCD_DT,'YYYYMMDD')) , least(TO_DATE(CTR_RSGTN_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),TO_DATE(END_RSGTN_DT,'YYYYMMDD'))),0) + 1 END END ) AS CLUT_DUP_MNTH_ICM FROM REMT3100) AA ) BB WHERE BB.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND BB.CLUT_YR_MNTH=#clutYrMnth# AND BB.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD=#calcSevePayPsnDivCd# AND BB.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
